page.title: 19My Mums Average Day
page.content: My mum gets up at 8:00am.She gets dressed and goes down stairs for a cup of tea. She then makes our breakfast, goes back up stairs and has a wash and brushes her teeth.After that she makes the beds. At 8:30am my mum sends us to school. When my sister and I are out of the way she washes up the breakfast things. She puts the washing machine on. Next she makes a cup of coffee and sits down and reads the paper. After she's had a rest she does the hoovering.Then she gets ready for shopping. She gets back from shopping about 11:30am. Next she makes our dinner. When we go back to school she washes up. Then she does the ironing. At 3:30pm when we come out of school mum gets changed for work. At 4:10pm she takes my sister and I to my aunties house then she goes to work. She comes home from work at 9:30pm.
